text: Albert O. Hirschman (1915–2012) was a famous economist and social scientist, author of some books on political economy. He studied economics at the London School of Economics, at HEC Paris, at the University of Paris and at the University of Trieste.Albert Hirschman, économiste engagé et "autosubversif" His first main contribution was in development economics.Un entretien avec Albert Hirschman In World War II, he played a key role in rescuing refugees in occupied France.Hirschman, un modèle pour "Alternatives Économiques" == References == Category:1915 births Category:German people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:2012 deaths
